song_lyrics: Na lādhī hajī e gahan shāstra vāto,
Na khādhī kadī e jamānānī lāto,
Rangī chundaḍī āpnī ang paheru... maḷyā
Dīṭhu ek me to tamāru ja vahāl,
Thayu māt tujne shishu ā uchheru,
Grahe to ja Shrījī vadhāvī ghaṇeru... maḷyā
Thayu dhanya sagpaṇ karī kīḍī keru... maḷyā
Dahe chhe patango magan e aganmā,
Banī hu divāno hari jyot heru​,​
Thajo rākh mārī pade āp bheru... maḷyā
title: Maḷyā āp mujne gamyā ​rang geru

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-3054: Sadhu Madhurvadandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
